title: Handle a Flight Cancellation
description: A passenger's flight has been cancelled by the airline due to weather. They need to be rebooked.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's original booking details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the affected passenger and flight.

tasks.description: Search for the next available flights to the same destination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds alternative flights for the passenger.

tasks.description: Rebook the passenger on the next available flight at no additional cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully rebooks the passenger and issues a new ticket.
